title: Merge Cannon: Chicken Defense
description:
Fight the highly aggressive chickens.Merge Cannon: Chicken Defense is one of the most chaotic defense/merge games you’ll ever play. You must protect the wall and continually upgrade your guns by merging them. But, the waves of chickens never cease in their relentless assault. That means you must keep your weapons as upgraded as possible at all times, which inevitably becomes quite challenging when you’re several merge levels deep!
Shop around for firepower.You can buy weapons individually in the shop. When you level up, more cannons become available. If you’re frantic about stopping the chickens, you can mash the cannon button to create more of any type and pray that works. You’ll also want to keep your wall strong and upgrade your defenses in the shop.
